translation:
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

I inform Your Excellency

May God keep Your Excellency Camp of the Picada, December 9, 1838. Sir Tomás José da Silva. Francisco Pedro de Abreu Major.

See above in that of 1839 of the same. [Attributed to Alfredo Varela, on page 1r.]
